aboutme.title: About Me
paragraphs: Experienced **Full Stack Software Developer** with over --8 years-- of experience in **software architecture** of scalable enterprise applications using **.NET, C#, React, SQL, and Azure**. **PMP-certified** professional with --DevOps-- proficiency (CI/CD, AzureDevops)
Strong background in **API** development, database optimization, and **cloud-native** solutions. Adept at delivering --secure--, --user-centered-- applications in Agile environments.
Passionate about --continuous learning--, with exposure to containerization tools **Docker**, secure coding practices, and accessible UI design.
